event.executesql: delete from woodforest.account.relatedparty where id in ( select acr.id from woodforest.dbo.account a inner join woodforest.account.RelatedParty acr on a.accountuid = acr.accountid inner join woodforest.dbo.customer c on acr.partyid = c.customeruid and a.coreid = 4 and abs(c.taxid) not in (select abs(taxid) from staging.acbs.HostMerge_CustomerAlias_Get) )
